text: Chuck Morse (born October 11, 1960) is an American politician. He was the President of the New Hampshire Senate from 2020 to 2022. Morse is a Republican. He represents New Hampshire's 22nd State Senate district. He was Acting Governor of New Hampshire for two days until Chris Sununu's became governor on January 5, 2017. Morse replaced Maggie Hassan because quit being governor to join the United States Senate on January 3, 2017. In July 2023, Morse announced his candidacy for governor in the 2024 election. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of New Hampshire Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court
title: Chuck Morse
